home.description: An open source parameter checker library written in TypeScript.

about.text:
The goal of this library is to provide an easy way to check if a parameter is what it is supposed to be. Function, object, ascii, integer, string, json...

You can help develop Ch.js on Github.

code.p1: Instantiate a Keyboard class and creates input listeners.

contact.description: Feel free to ask me about my work, give me suggestions, or just to say hi.
